posts.post_content:
Just bought a nice lot of 10. Six I needed plus a couple of upgrades so I am
left with these four guys to trade. They are Ball (Cleveland), Kruger, Lake (no ball in hand) and Pastorius.  My monster number is 251 so there are probably 200 commons I need. Sorry I don't have a wantlist.  Let me know what you have to swap. I prefer to trade for now but will entertain offers to buy if they are not spoken for by Monday.
Kruger and Lake are spoken for.  Ball is on hold.  Pastorius is still available.
